    reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50),
    reservation_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    party_size INT
);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    table_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

);

### STATEMENT

SELECT * FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity;

    reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50),
    reservation_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    party_size INT
);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    table_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),

### STATEMENT

SELECT guest_name, location FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity WHERE s.is_reserved = FALSE;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50),
    reservation_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    party_size INT
);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    table_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT r.guest_name AS guest, s.table_name AS table FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity;

### STATEMENT

SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, location FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity WHERE s.location = 'Outdoor Patio';

);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (

### STATEMENT

SELECT guest_name, table_name, reservation_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity WHERE s.is_reserved = TRUE;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50),
    reservation_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    party_size INT
);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    table_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT r.* FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity WHERE s.capacity IS NULL;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50),
    reservation_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    party_size INT
);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    table_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT table_name, location, COUNT(*) AS number_of_reservations FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity GROUP BY table_name, location;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50),
    reservation_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    party_size INT
);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    table_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY guest_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

### STATEMENT

SELECT DISTINCT guest_name FROM reservations;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50),
    reservation_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    party_size INT
);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    table_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT table_name, location, SUM(r.party_size) AS total_capacity FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity GROUP BY table_name, location;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50),
    reservation_date DATE,
    reservation_time TIME,
    party_size INT
);
CREATE TABLE seating_arrangements (
    table_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    is_reserved BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations UNION SELECT table_name, location, capacity AS party_size FROM seating_arrangements;
